description: Details of archaeological works part pursuant to condition 6 of (approved plans) of PP/2014/4433 dated 31/10/2014 which provided for an approved plans condition to planning permission P/2001/3009 dated 05/02/2002 (subsequently extended by P/2007/0389 dated 19/03/2012) for demolition of existing service garage/workshop and construction of two 2-storey terraced properties comprising two 1-bedroom flats at ground floor level and two 2-bedroom maisonettes at first floor roof space level. Amendments to provide for alteration to front entrance, alteration of approved fenestration on front elevation, repositioning of approved rear dormers, ;alteration to pitch of approved rear outrigger, replacement of approved rear facing openings to outrigger with juliet balconies at first floor level and glazed doors at ground floor level and alteration of side rear facing openings.
